name: AnimalCompanyTweak
options:
  bundleIdPrefix: com.animalcompany
  deploymentTarget:
    iOS: 13.0
  usesTabs: false
  indentWidth: 4
  tabWidth: 4
configs:
  Debug: debug
  Release: release
schemes:
  AnimalCompanyTweak:
    build:
      targets:
        AnimalCompanyTweak: all
    test:
      targets: []
targets:
  AnimalCompanyTweak:
    type: library.dynamic
    platform: iOS
    deploymentTarget: 13.0
    sources:
      - path: Tweak(1).mm
    settings:
      base:
        CLANG_ENABLE_MODULES: YES
        CLANG_ENABLE_OBJC_ARC: YES
        HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS:
          - $(SRCROOT)
        LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS:
          - $(SRCROOT)
        OTHER_LDFLAGS:
          - -framework UIKit
          - -framework QuartzCore
          - -framework Foundation
          - -ldl
        ARCHS: arm64
        VALID_ARCHS: arm64
        SDKROOT: iphoneos
        IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET: 13.0
